snippet: The victim was approached from behind near Central Park and shot once in the head, the police said, by a man who then fled in a car driven by another person.
abstract: The victim was approached from behind near Central Park and shot once in the head, the police said, by a man who then fled in a car driven by another person.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and WENDY RUDERMAN

headline.main: Man Fatally Shot on Midtown Street
headline.print_headline: Gunshot on Busy Midtown Street Leaves a 31-Year-Old Man Dead
